jobDesc: Developed and maintained the admin's website using the Typescript and NextJS framework.
Worked in a team of 3, while collaborating with the UI/UX team and Back-end developers.
Migrated Styled-Components to TailwindCSS to make the code cleaner.
Implemented the UI/UX design of a new feature called 'Promote' from scratch.
Designed and developed Zada and County platform using PHP programming language with Laravel framework.
Designed and developed user interface and user experience for the project application.
Implemented designs into HTML, CSS, and Javascript code for the project application with the help of TailwindCSS and alpineJS library.
Ensured the quality and responsiveness of the user interface and user experience.
